function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of immunity and effective vaccine for COVID-19","Impact":"Continued spread of the pandemic","Mitigation":"Accelerate vaccine development and prioritize global immunity","Technologies":"Vaccine development and distribution technologies","People":"General population, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Increased anxiety and panic due to repetitive alerts","Impact":"Negative impact on mental health and well-being","Mitigation":"Provide clear and accurate communication, offer mental health support services","Technologies":"Communication platforms, mental health support technologies","People":"General population, individuals receiving alerts","Owner":"Health organizations, mental health support organizations"},{"Description":"Concerns regarding individual rights and privacy","Impact":"Potential violations of privacy and individual rights","Mitigation":"Obtain prior consent, conceal individual identities","Technologies":"Privacy protection technologies, consent management systems","People":"General population, individuals under surveillance","Owner":"Government, organizations implementing surveillance framework"}]}
